name: The Price of a Mile
description:
The Price of a Mile

This game is being built as part of the Juice Jam II (https://itch.io/jam/gdb-juice-jam-ii)

These are the last minutes of the Great War. The armistice has been signed, but the agreement will take effect from 11 AM. You are the commander of one of the regiments and you have been ordered to occupy as much territory as possible before the end of the conflict. So get your whistle ready, follow your order and pay the price in young men's lives!

The Price of a Mile is a simple strategy game that takes place during Great War conflict. Your task is to get with your squad as far as possible into the enemy lines. You have to watch out for enemy soldiers, MG nests, barbed wire and much more. Everything in simple 2D graphics in top-down like perspective.

Creators:

Rose Buddies Game Studio

  1. Nienawisc - Chief Technology Officer, General Game Designer
  2. Myszon - Music Director, 2D Artist
  3. Wuosiu - Programmer, Game Designer, Chief Ciągnienie Druta Specialist
